articles.content:
Pep Guardiola's substitutions at Southampton in the FA Cup not only sealed a valuable quarter final win, but also confirmed the manager's thoughts on his strongest Manchester City XI.

articles.title: Eddie Hearn explains why he cropped fighter out of UFC photo with Anthony Joshua - The Mirror
articles.description: Hearn cropped rising heavyweight star Frazer Clarke out of his Instagram profile from the UFC London event at the O2 Arena, but later explained he wanted to use a close-up image
articles.content:
Eddie Hearn has insisted he "loves" Frazer Clarke and only cropped the heavyweight star out of his UFC London Instagram post because he wanted to zoom in.
